com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.configuration

Annotation Type MotorType

  • Deprecated. 
    Use MotorType instead. MotorType is an annotation with which a class or interface can be decorated in order to define a new kind of motor that can be configured in the robot configuration user interface.

    @Documented
 @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Deprecated
public @interface MotorType

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      double gearing
      Deprecated. 
      Returns the number of revolutions of the actual motor for each revolution of the output shaft
      double maxRPM
      Deprecated. 
      Returns the rated maximum no-load RPM of the motor output shaft
      java.lang.String name
      Deprecated. 
      Returns the name to use when describing the class in configuration user interfaces.
      double ticksPerRev
      Deprecated. 
      Returns the number of encoder ticks per revolution of the output shaft of the gearmotor.
      java.lang.String xmlTag
      Deprecated. 
      Returns the XML tag to use to represent configured instances of the annotated class as recorded in saved robot configurations.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      double achieveableMaxRPMFraction
      Deprecated. 
      Returns the fraction of maxRPM which can be achieved in closed loop control
      Rotation orientation
      Deprecated. 
      Indicates the direction of rotation in which encoder counts increase when looking down the motor shaft towards the motor.

    • Element Detail

      • xmlTag

        public abstract java.lang.String xmlTag
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the XML tag to use to represent configured instances of the annotated class as recorded in saved robot configurations. You should choose a tag that is different than any other sensor type.
        Returns:
        the XML tag to use for instances of the annotated sensor class

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the name to use when describing the class in configuration user interfaces.
        Returns:
        the name to use for this kind of motor in user interfaces

      • ticksPerRev

        public abstract double ticksPerRev
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the number of encoder ticks per revolution of the output shaft of the gearmotor. Surprisingly, this can be a non-integer value; this can easily arise for motors which have encoders mounted before the gearbox rather than after.
        Returns:
        the number of encoder ticks per revolution of the output shaft of the gearmotor

      • gearing

        public abstract double gearing
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the number of revolutions of the actual motor for each revolution of the output shaft
        Returns:
        the number of revolutions of the actual motor for each revolution of the output shaft

      • maxRPM

        public abstract double maxRPM
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the rated maximum no-load RPM of the motor output shaft
        Returns:
        the rated maximum no-load RPM of the motor output shaft

      • achieveableMaxRPMFraction

        public abstract double achieveableMaxRPMFraction
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the fraction of maxRPM which can be achieved in closed loop control
        Returns:
        the fraction of maxRPM which can be achieved in closed loop control
        Default:
        0.85

      • orientation

        public abstract Rotation orientation
        Deprecated. 
        Indicates the direction of rotation in which encoder counts increase when looking down the motor shaft towards the motor.
        Default:
        org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.external.navigation.Rotation.CW
